column2: NY Fed moves to dismiss suit brought by former Goldman examiner NEW YORK
column3: Jan 3 The New York Federal Reserve Bank filed a motion on Friday to dismiss a lawsuit brought by a former employee who claimed she was fired after refusing to alter a critical examination of Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
